DOC.criteria: Ability understand willingness sign write informed consent document . Signed write informed consent . Women undergo sentinel lymph node biopsy . Women breast cancer know suspect lymph node involvement . Women undergo sentinel node identification completion axillary lymph node dissection . Women 18 year age old . Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group ( ECOG ) Karnofsky Performance Status 0,1,2 . Complete Blood Count ( CBC ) basic Metabolic Panel within 6 month History liver kidney failure eligible . Allergies iodine contain product eligible . Women pregnant eligible . Psychiatric addictive disorder condition , opinion investigator , would preclude patient meeting study requirement .
